product_name: National Geographic Washington, D.C. Destination Map
long_description: The National Geographic Washington, D.C. Destination map combines a highly detailed shaded relief map of the U.S. capital city, complete with visitor and guidebook information.
short_description: The National Geographic Washington, D.C. Destination map combines a highly detailed shaded relief map of the U.S. capital city, complete with visitor and guidebook information.
